kpi.name: M8018C5

kpi_info.title: Active UE Contexts released due to S1 Reset messages (partial and global) initiated by the eNB
kpi_info.use: The number of active UE contexts being released due to S1 Reset procedure initiated by eNB (all released active UE contexts are counted RRC Connected with at least one DRB). Number is updated once by the number of affected UEs. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:RESET Message (partial or global).

kpi.kpi_alias: Active UE Contexts released due to S1 Reset messages (partial and global) initiated by the eNB
